lines.text: And remember, once you go out those doors, don't stop to think about what you feel. Because once you stop to think about what you feel, you doubt what you know. And once you doubt what you know, you're gonna assume you don't know it. Why? Because you don't act on it. Once you know what you know, you act on it.

[to a girl]
What was it Kubrick said? The manipulation of light and color produces an illusion of profound intensity?
[girl walks away, man stops the next girl that walks by]
What was it Kubrick said?
There are three rules in the film business - Distribution, distribution, distribution.
You've got to have gross points. Not net points, but gross points.
Did you say Grosse Pointe? I'm from Grosse Pointe.
If you're free for the weekend, there's a lot going on. This is New York!
Free for the weekend? I'll never be free as long as I'm a black man in America!
Don't go messin' up in Deep Barons!
You'll get what you deserve in them Deep Barons, you lez-beans! You won't be causin' no one no trouble no more!
Outside the United States they don't have marshmallows.
Then it's like the only really American food. Wow!
I'm not dumb!
You're dumb, you like punk!
It's a beautiful day, you see? You see? You're all alone in the park, sittin' on a park bench, and you're readin' somethin' real good.
Yeah, like a muscle magazine.
I'll get the Kodak!
Ike, you better bolt that door good tonight.
Ma, there's nobody out there...
Now you just do what I say! Queenie's out there, I just know it.
[repeated lines]
Punk sucks!
Disco's stupid.
You backwoods, perverted piece of shit!
Don't you ever say backwoods again! We're city-fied, look around.
Jackie, everywhere you turned in life you got shit. Well now we'll do the fighting back for you.

[using a Ouija board]
B-O-T-E... Boat! I got it, ma! Ouija says they're on a boat!
Addley, you tell your brother Ike a hound dog that comes home with nothing in his mouth should keep it closed.

[can't remember it all]
Ike, ma says a hound dog who comes home... em -- empty handed should keep... keep your big fat mouth shut!
Thank you for sharing this experience with me. You're beautiful and I love you
I love you
